name: MEC Ursus Pants - Infants
description:
Warmth for small bears. The Ursus Pant is a simple layer that's easy to pull on. The mid-weight fleece is an adaptable weight fabric that can be worn alone or layered under shell pants or rain pants in colder settings.Made of durable anti-pill fleece that’s brushed on both sides for coziness.Comfortable elastic waistband.Slim fit legs are designed for layering.Hand me down label inside.Coordinates with MEC Ursus Jacket.Care instructions: Machine wash cold separately. Tumble dry low. Don’t bleach, iron, dry clean or use fabric softeners.

        Sustainability
